page.title: 15Religious Worship
page.content: A{multi-ethnic}area has many religiuos groups.Christian worshippers meet in many established churches for example at the{Old Church,Church {Rd,Sme.}Below,Ekhalaq Ahmed and Bisharat Ali (age 9) combine to write about their "church" and religion. 'I go to the{mosque in Cape Hill every day. When I get there I read the {Koran.}The mosque is a{house.}We pray downstairs and the girls and the ladies read upstairs. If we drop the Koran we get into{trouble.}During {Ramadan}when{fasting}we get up at{2.am to eat. There are{30 fasting days}and then it is{Eid,}a muslim festival. We put up{decorations and celebrate because this is the day the Koran was {finished.}At Eid I go to the mosque and read{namaaz.}In my best clothes I go to visit cousins. I like Eid because I get lots of money.'
